The Xinmiao Jinglaoyuan Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the Ordos City, Inner Mongolia

province: 内蒙古自治区 (Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region)

operators: 铁煤集团内蒙古东新煤炭有限责任公司 (Tiem Coal Group Inner Mongolia Dongxin Coal Co., Ltd.)
web_search_companies.notes: The mine was originally a private enterprise and was restructured in 2010 to form a joint venture with Liaoning Tifa Coal Industry Group.
